channel.title: introduction on CS Research
channel.description: Recent content in introduction on CS Research

item.title: Overview
item.description: An algorithm is a set of instructions that tells a computer how to solve a problem. It is a well-defined sequence of steps that can be followed to achieve a specific outcome. Algorithms can be simple or complex. Some algorithms, such as the one used to search for a word in a dictionary, are relatively easy to understand. Others, such as the algorithms used to train artificial intelligence, can be quite complex.
